channel.title: Bear companion bug!
channel.description:
#### What happened? I was a hunter. It was a cult game with a reaper. Night 1, nothing happens. Day 2, I talk a lot of smack to get people to attack me. Night 2, I drop the new fancy bear companion. That night, someone attacks me, it says it bypasses my night immunity and I die. I was not reaped. My attacker didn't die.
I confirmed with the cult leader at the end of the game that he used empower eradicate on me n2. I died, he didn't die. I also confirmed with the NK (reaper) that he did not reap me. There was no alch.
The only person who attacked me on n2 was the cult leader using empowered eradicate. #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? I should have died due to the empowered eradicate, but the cult leader should have also died. #### Steps to reproduce: Empowered eradicate a hunter using bear companion. #### Comments:
